title: Extract Database Definition Files to SAP HANA - MediationZone Documentation 9.4 - InfoZone
text: When SAP HANA and MediationZone are not installed on the same machine (the database may be installed on any machine within the network), the database definition files need to be transferred to the SAP HANA machine before the database can be created. The database definition files are created in the ./database/saphana subdirectory and archived in the database-setup.tar file. On the SAP HANA machine (as a SAP HANA UNIX user): transfer the database-setup.tar file from the MediationZone machine and extract the files: tar -xvf ./database-setup.tar Enter the database directory : cd database/saphana
